scripts.create:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do yarn create:env $ENV_NAME; done
scripts.flatten:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn flatten:env; done
scripts.flatten:env:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn flatten:env; done
scripts.get:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_PREFIX=$ENV_PREFIX ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:env; done; flatten:env:all
scripts.get:env:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_PREFIX=$ENV_PREFIX ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:env; done; yarn flatten:env:dev
scripts.load:all: yarn load:permissions && yarn load:synpuf1k && yarn load:vocab
scripts.op:get:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_base} ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:op; done
scripts.op:get:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_base} ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:op; done
scripts.op:get:local: for ENV_NAME in base-all base-local local; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:op; done
scripts.op:get:remote: for ENV_NAME in base-all base-remote $ENV_NAME; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:op; done
scripts.op:put:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_base} ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn put:env; done
scripts.op:put:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_base} ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn put:env; done
scripts.put:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_PREFIX=$ENV_PREFIX ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn put:env; done
scripts.put:env:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_PREFIX=$ENV_PREFIX ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn put:env; done
